summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Big Size Nail Vacuum Dust Collector with 5 Dust Collecting Bags Review Date: 2017/09/17 Store: SUBAY Average Rating: 3.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '11.5 x 10.12 x 4.88 inches; 2.9 Pounds'} Review Text: Nice shiny silver color. Does not intake dust as well as older model. Review Title: Two Stars Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makartt Nail Suction Dust Collector New No-spilling Filter 40W Strong Power Review Date: 2019/01/30 Store: Makartt Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10.47 x 9.84 x 3.86 inches; 2.63 Pounds'} Review Text: When I first received this it was great. Until the filter was covered in dust. I emptied it out. Took a blow dryer to it and the dust is collected in the filter, but it’s also blowing all over the place as well. I used stronger pressure from an air compressors to blow the dust out and it came out, however, it’s not sucking the air like it did when I first got it.
Solution? Buy more filters even if it hasn’t been 2-3 months I thought it may be good to rotate out 3 different filters daily and use the air compressor on the filters once a week. It’s still not sucking the air well. I’d avoid this at all cost. $69.99 on the dust collector, $19.99 on the replacement filters. My clothes are covered in dust. Do not purchase! Waste of money. Review Title: Covered in dust Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Makartt No-spilling Filter 2Pcs for Nail Dust Collector Fan Dust Extractor Machine Review Date: 2019/01/30 Store: Makartt Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 7.48 x 1.18 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} Review Text: They worked great the first time I used each filter but that’s it. After being emptied and cleaned they don’t suck dust like they once did. How are these filters supposed to last 2-3 months??? They are horrible! I clean them daily with an air compressor and I’m still covered in dust while working. Review Title: Waste of money Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 110 Pairs Lash Under Eye Pads, Teenitor Eyelash Extension Gel Pads, Lint Free Lash Extension Eye Gel Patches Golden Review Date: 2019/03/06 Store: Teenitor Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 4.6 x 3.6 inches; 11.68 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'TNT757'} Review Text: Good quality and price! Review Title: Highly recommend Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Classic and Volume Eyelash Extensions Faux Mink Thickness Curl Mixed Tray Cruelty-free Volume Faux Mink Eyelash Extensions 12 rows for Salon Use - by Sylvia Lashes (0.05D MIX) Review Date: 2019/04/08 Store: Sylvia Lashes Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sylvia Lashes', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 2.2 x 0.6 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '704751124892'} Review Text: Ordered multiple times. These are not flat ellipse lashes! Review Title: Regular volume lashes, not flat ellipse lashes Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Customized Massage Mattress Bed Sheet/Mattress Protector Suitable for Thickening Massage Mattress Fashion Comfort Minimalism Style (Grey) Review Date: 2019/07/11 Store: Bergotti Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '10 x 9.06 x 2.05 inches; 1.19 Pounds', 'UPC': '604270867846', 'Manufacturer': 'Bergotti'} Review Text: This is a lot bigger and it fits funny on my massage bed. Review Title: Too big Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a clear trend of dissatisfaction with products designed for dust collection and extraction, particularly regarding their performance and durability. The user frequently experiences frustration with the effectiveness of these tools, leading to negative reviews, particularly when filters fail to meet expectations or lead to messiness. A consistent sentiment of disappointment in both quality and value emerges from multiple interactions in this category.

Conversely, the user expresses satisfaction with beauty-related items, showing a preference for quality and value, as evidenced by higher ratings for products like eyelash extension gels. This indicates a willingness to invest in effective beauty items, contrasting with their discontent in the dust collection category.

The user displays price sensitivity towards certain items, particularly with dissatisfaction when they perceive a product to be overpriced for the value received (e.g., dust collectors and filters). However, they show less price concern when purchasing beauty supplies, as highlighted by a positive sentiment despite varying price points.

In summary, this individual favors reliability and effectiveness in beauty products, while expressing frustration with the performance and value of cleaning tools, highlighting a discerning preference for quality across different product purposes.

target_interaction.title: Not flat lashes
target_interaction.text: Tips are ellipse but the lashes are not flat
